entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: The village where Harry and Hermione go to visit. (Introduced in the text as a place where students are permitted to visit.)

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who suggests they visit Hogsmeade. (Introduced in the text as someone who tells Harry it would be good for him to get away from the castle.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is permitted to visit Hogsmeade. (Introduced in the text as someone who is being persuaded by Hermione to go to Hogsmeade.)

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who Hermione suggests they meet up with in Hogsmeade. (Introduced in the text as someone Harry is hesitant to meet up with.)

entities.name: three broomsticks
entities.description: A place where Hermione and Harry plan to meet Ron. (Introduced in the text as a location where they might meet up with Ron.)

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione go to Hogsmeade together. (Introduced in the text as they set off for Hogsmeade.)
Harry is visiting Hogsmeade. (Introduced in the text as a place where students are permitted to visit.)
Hermione is visiting Hogsmeade. (Introduced in the text as a place where students are permitted to visit.)
Hermione plans to meet Ron at the Three Broomsticks. (Introduced in the text as a location where they might meet up with Ron.)
